attributes.action: There should be no further vote on the EU,we have made our decision.
attributes.additional_details: For some reason I am not allowed to use as many characters as the current petition and already am at a disadvantage...
attributes.background: There is a current petition to have a new vote because people are panicking.We have had the election, it has already caused massive division and the starts of uprising, we have had nothing but lies from both sides. But we have made our choice and we must deal with it now and move forwards.together!!
